title: MedMutual Maternity
description:
MedMutual Maternity is for Medical Mutual and Mutual Health Services members.

At Medical Mutual, we’re here for you, today and everyday – especially when you’re expecting or raising your little one. The MedMutual Maternity app is your one place for trusted health information through every age and stage.

MedMutual Maternity offers guidance throughout your pregnancy, plus parenting tips and health information for your newborn and toddler. Seamlessly track your baby’s feedings, stay on top of those important milestones and get daily tips about every trimester of your pregnancy, all in one place. 

PREGNANCY
- Weekly pregnancy to-do list and reminders
- Get notifications about important information regarding your pregnancy, To Dos, and more on the home feed’s Highlights.
- Receive personalized support for conditions like hypertension and diabetes with special tools including a glucose tracker and blood pressure tracker
- Pregnancy trackers for baby’s movement, your due date, and your healthy weight gain (syncs with Apple Health Kit)
- Relax with the Baby Boost meditation feature
- Health articles in the Learn Library

NEWBORN & TODDLER
- Feeding, diaper and growth tracker
- Developmental milestones by age, literacy, dental health and nutrition tips
- Articles on caring for your newborn from breastfeeding to safe sleeping
- Q-list of questions you want to ask at your doctor appointments

MEDICAL MUTUAL CONNECTIONS
- Simple click-to-call for answers to your benefits and coverage questions
- Rely on the 24/7 nurse line
- Find a doctor for OB and pediatrics
- Access your member portal

The MedMutual Maternity app is designed with OB/GYN consultation to give you the support you need to actively manage your pregnancy and help keep you and your baby as healthy as possible. We are a HIPAA compliant app, dedicated to protecting your privacy and security.

The MedMutual Maternity app is for educational purposes only and not a substitute for your doctor's treatment or care recommendations. Neither the content nor any other service offered through the app is intended to be relied on for medical diagnosis or treatment. In the event of a medical emergency, dial 911 or visit the nearest hospital.

summary: Your pregnancy health and baby app created for Medical Mutual and MHS members.
